title: Tillis Supports the Stop Sanctuary Policies and Protect Americans Act (US Senate Committee on Judiciary) ...
text: ( Source : US Senate Committee on Judiciary ) Today , Senator Thom Tillis (R-NC) voted in favor of S.2146, the Stop Sanctuary Policies and Protect Americans Act. While the legislation failed by a 54-45 vote, Senator Tillis supported the bill
